task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

plannerResult.raw_task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

subtasks.name: agent-shell
subtasks.objective: Set up the frontend scaffold with project structure, app entry point, and a Tasks page route/container.

subtasks.name: agent-components
subtasks.objective: Implement basic Tasks UI components: add-task form, task list, and task item with complete/incomplete visual states using mock/local state.

subtasks.name: agent-polish
subtasks.objective: Add simple responsive styling, empty-state messaging, and lightweight interaction checks/tests for create and toggle flows.
